apps.name: Played
apps.subtitle: Track your gaming journey
apps.localizedDescription: Played is your personal game tracker. Add games from IGDB, track what you're playing, manage your backlog, and sync with Google Drive.

privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Played uses the local network to discover and connect with PlayedSync on your PC to track gaming sessions.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Played may use the camera for future features.

versions.localizedDescription:
Liquid Glass & Polish

• All glass effects now use .clear for transparency
• 30-second debounce on sync toasts
• Shows 'Currently playing' when opening mid-session
• Improved code quality for Swift 6 concurrency
